property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.ProgressRing.Angle
property.summary: Gets or sets the value of the angle for the child elements of the indicator.
property.value: A value of the angle for the child elements of the indicator or -1d, if the child element is outside the circle. Default value = -1d.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ProgressRing.GetAngle(System.Windows.UIElement)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The value of the angle for the child element of the control.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.ProgressRing.SetAngle(System.Windows.UIElement,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The value of the angle for the child element of the control.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.
